overview: Joy Love is a mentally-ill patient with anthropophobia, the fear of people. She is only friends with Chickie, a talking eagle stuffed toy. Although Chickie talks to her, she never talks back to him. And then one day, as Joy Loveâ€™s birthday approaches, Chickie plans to surprise her along with his friends leading to the revelation of their secrets.
title: Handuraw sa Kahilitan
